definition: unable to escape/can't get out
to escape/to run away/to flee
(negative prefix)/not/no

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc

sentences.english: Slightly, the two are Taobuchu her my palm.
sentences.chinese: 略，讓她倆都逃不出我的手心。

sentences.english: Even the most winged spirit cannot escape physical necessity.
sentences.chinese: 連那最高超的心靈，也逃不出物質的需要。

sentences.english: The enemy cannot escape from our control.
sentences.chinese: 敵人逃不出我們的手心。

sentences.english: It's a circle; you get nowhere .
sentences.chinese: 這是一個循環，你就逃不出這個圈子。
什麼聲音也逃不出他的耳朵。

sentences.english: Thee enemy cannot escape from our control.

sentences.english: You have every little change in our eyes that escape.
sentences.chinese: 你的每一點兒變化都逃不出我們的火眼金睛。

sentences.english: That even the highest levels of the soul, but also escape from material needs.
sentences.chinese: 連那最高超的心靈，也逃不出物質的需要。

sentences.english: Heroes have to come back fighting, the city is absolutely not escape the fate of destruction.
sentences.chinese: 英雄必須回來戰鬥，不然城市絕對逃不出毀滅的命運。
